data.name: Choo-Choo! Train Rides!
data.detailed_description:
It’s quite common for creatures to mutate due to environmental pollution. Time passed by, and people must pay for their sins.

An unexplored organism had originated in close vicinity of postwar Europe. It affects on nervous systems of the beasts making them overly aggressive, vicious and bloodthirsty. Numerous creatures had died through it, but plenty of their kinds remained alive. They were becoming a serious threat to the existence of humanity.
Felix Klerx was working as an ordinary train driver. He didn’t believe the news until he had met the danger face to face.

You must defend yourself, search for the resources, drive the train, and the most important one - survive.

Features


  • Arcade mode
  • Story mode
  • Procedural generation
  • Dedicated leaderboards
  • Full controller support
data.about_the_game:
It’s quite common for creatures to mutate due to environmental pollution. Time passed by, and people must pay for their sins.

An unexplored organism had originated in close vicinity of postwar Europe. It affects on nervous systems of the beasts making them overly aggressive, vicious and bloodthirsty. Numerous creatures had died through it, but plenty of their kinds remained alive. They were becoming a serious threat to the existence of humanity.
Felix Klerx was working as an ordinary train driver. He didn’t believe the news until he had met the danger face to face.

You must defend yourself, search for the resources, drive the train, and the most important one - survive.

Features


  • Arcade mode
  • Story mode
  • Procedural generation
  • Dedicated leaderboards
  • Full controller support
data.short_description: Find out that your old world is no longer exists. You have only a locomotive, a small bunch of companions and a tail of bloodthirsty mutated wild creatures that are hungry as never before. There are a couple of ways to survive. Which one is better? - It's up to you.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8,10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720(16:9) or higher screen resolution.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card. Minimum supported resolution: 1280x720
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card. Recommended supported resolution: 1280x720.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.
